locations.name: Pepsi Amphitheater
locations.description: Taco and Tequila Festival featuring Maxi Priest
locations.location_hours: 2 hours before and after each event.

locations.name: Lowell Observatory
locations.description: Activities throughout the day, including science demonstrations, grounds tours, and multimedia presentations. At night, enjoy telescope viewing and stargazing.
locations.location_address: 1400 W Mars Hill Rd  Flagstaff, AZ 86001

locations.name: Wheeler Park
locations.description: Like the Oktoberfest in Munich, the Flagstaff Oktoberfest would not be true to its name if it were not complete with a constant flow of great beer.  Complete with a great polka line-up on the stage the Oktoberfest in Flagstaff packs all the fun of the 16-day celebration into one happening and unbelievable Saturday in beautiful downtown Flagstaff.

locations.name: The Arboretum at Flagstaff
locations.description: The Arboretum at Flagstaff opens for the 2013 season on Wednesday, May 1 from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.  Located on 200 acres within the Coconino National Forest, The Arboretum is a research and environmental education center, home to 2,500 species of plants in greenhouses, gardens, and natural habitats.
locations.location_address: 4001 S Woody Mountain Rd Flagstaff, AZ 86001
